admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

abstracts.cdata!:
The Bank of Alexandria Project will
            assist in meeting BOA's foreign exchange requirements
            for the financing of equipment imports for specific
            industrial enterprises through 1974. The beneficiary will
            maintain at all times a sound liquidity position and will
            consult with IDA should its medium and long-term portfolio
            exceed six times net worth as stated in the balance sheet,
            with a view to reach understanding on additions to
            BOA's equity base, if and when, in IDA's view,
            such increase will be needed.
